title.english: Praise God, from whom All Blessings Flow

zo.1:
Thu kheempeuh hong pia Pasian
Phat un, leitung mi khempeuh aw
Phat un, vantung mi honpi'n zong phat un
Pa Ta le khasiangthou

title.english: The King of Love My Shepherd Is (Dominus Regit Me)

zo.1:
Itna Kumpi, ka tuu-cing pa,
Ama hoihna sia ngei lo,
A mi suak leng sapna om lo,
Tawntung Ama mi hi ta.
zo.2:
Nuntakna tui a luanna ah,
Tat khiat sa ka kha ton pih,
Lono na ah hong pai pih hi,
Vantung aa tawh hong vaak hi.
zo.3:
Khuamial sihna kuam sung lau lo,
Kei kiang Topa Na om hi,
Ka lung nuam sak,
Na ciang khut in,
Lam hong hilh singlamteh in.
zo.4:
Ni sim tawntung kizom suak in,
Na hoihna kipelh ngei lo,
Tuu-cing siampa, Nang kong phat hi,
Tawntung Nangma innpi sung-Amen.

zo.1:
Vantung zahtak huai Kumpipa bia un,
A vaanglian leh hong it na la sa un,
A hong liah hong keem hong uk tawntung maangpi
A vaanglian hi, ci in phat huai Topa hi.
zo.2:
Hong it hong hehpihna van pan taanga
A vaang liatna thu la in sa un la
A heh ciangin kekkia tawh kibang ding hi
A thu khenna in haksa mahmah ding hi.
zo.3:
Na lamdang tawh a dim leisung in ah
Vaanglian tawntung tawh Pasian a hong piang
Pel ngei lo na hanciamna tawh a kip hi
Puan bangin a kiimkot tuipi hih sak hi.
zo.4:
Naupang bangin thanem leiyui tate,
Nang sungah muan'na bukna kong mu diam;
Nong hehpihna kicing a tawpdonginah,
Hong bawl pa, hong dal pa, hong gum pa i Lawm.

title.zo: Pa Tung Min Than'na Om Hen

zo.1:
Pa tung min than'na om hen,
Tapa tung leh Kha Siangtho tungah zong,
Piancil lai leh tuhun bangin,
A tawntung in hih leitung om den ding hi. Amen Amen.

title.english: Now Thank We All Our God

zo.1:
Lungsim khut le kam tawh
Pasian tung i lung dam hi.
A bawl lam dangte tawh
Leitung kheempeuh lungdam hi.
Nute'ang pan kipan
Tuni ciang dong takin
Kigen thei lo it na'n
Hong keem thupha takin.
zo.2:
A cing, migi Pasian
I khan tawntung hong nai hen.
Lungdam lung nopna siang
Hong ompih sak tawntung hen.
A hehpihna sungah
Lungman' ciang lam lak hen.
Lei pan vantung dongah
A sia hong pel sak hen.
zo.3:
Pa Pasianle Tapa,
Amau tawh maang Kha Siangtho
Tu'n phatna lungdamna
Van saang belah i puak to
Leitung, vantung, tawntung
Amah bek biakna pia'n
Tuma, tulai, tunung
Amah khat bek Pasian.

title.zo: Pasian Vaang Liatna Ka Phat Nuam Hi!
title.english: Oh Could I Speak The Matchless Worth!

zo.1:
Hong gum Topa tung ah a taang
A lian tawntung mahmah a vaang
Phat ding kah to thei leng
Vantung leeng to in gawsem tawh
A lamdang la ka sa ding ta.
Gabela dem nuam ing.
Gabela dem nuam ing.
zo.2:
Mawhna pan hong tat khiat na'ngin
Zeisu'n A si hong bua zo hi.
Pasian lungdam na'ng in,
Ama vaanglian a siangthona
A dem zo om kei, A siamna.
La pha sa tawntung ni.
La pha sa tawntung ni.
zo.3:
A saang vantung tokhom tungah
Tu in a om hong uk Topa
Zeisu a hong itna
A ngaih mah mah la awte tawh
A vaanglian phatna la sakna
Keimah ka hilh ding hi.
Keimah ka hilh ding hi.
zo.4:
Lungdam huai Ama maitangpi
Hong mu in ci'n a hong sap ni
A hong tung lai ding hi
Hong it manin zawhna ngaha
Hong gum Zeisu ka u kiangah
Ka om tawntung ding hi.
Ka om tawntung ding hi.

title.english: How Sweet The Name of Jesus Sounds

zo.1:
Zeisu a min bangzah ngaih hiam
A um ta dingin ah
Gimna, natna damsak a nuam.
Launa a hawl khia ta.
zo.2:
A zan gawp lungsim damsak hi
Dahna lungsim nuamsak.
Kha Siangtho kial vahna pia hi.
A gim mi tawl damsak.
zo.3:
A to suangpi it huai minpha
Gal panna belhna hi.
A tam bel itna hehpihna
A ki kholna lian hi.
zo.4:
Zeisu lawmpa, tuu cingpa,
Ka siampi, ka kumpi,
Ka Topa hin'na lam a pha a,
Phat tawntung ngah pah hi.

title.zo: Hong Pai In, Thupha Nam Kim Nak
title.english: Come, Thou Fount Of Every Blessing

zo.1:
Hong pai in, thupha nam kim Nak,
Ka lungsim hong puahsak in;
Kang ngei lo Nong hehpihna Nak,
Nakpi'n hong phat thei sak in.
Vantung mite phatna la ngaih
Kei zong hong sa thei nuam ing;
Nong itna tung kip ka lung ngaih,
Tua itna mual ka phat ding.
zo.2:
Nong huhna tawh hih ciang kong tung,
Huhna mual suang hiah phut ing;
Nong deih sakna hangin tu nung
Lung muangin inn hong tung ning.
Lam khial a Pasian ka nusia,
Ahih hang Zeisu'n hong zong;
A si manpha tawh hong tan khia
Gimna lauhuai pan hong hon.
zo.3:
A ni simin hong hehpihna
A tampi hong ba sak den;
Na hehpih na'n hong khih in la,
Na kiang pan hong pial sak ke'n.
Topa kong vak san dek zeel hi,
Ka it Pasian, hong keem in;
Hiah! ka lungsim, Nang sung seel ni,
Nang aadiing Na ciamteh in.

zo.1:
Leitungah om mihingte aw
Pasian phatna la sa un la
A vaang liatna thu gen un la
A mai pai in sa un nopna.
zo.2:
Amah bek Pasian takpi hi.
Mi kheempeuh bawl Topa hia;
Ka tuute hong suak un, hong ci
Kong keem, kong cing nuam ci in ah.
zo.3:
Hong itna in bei thei ngei kei,
Hong hehpihna om tawntung hi;
A thu ciamna sia sak ngei kei.
A min i phat tawntung ding hi.
zo.4:
Pasian bang hang migi bel hiam
A hong itna maan tak tak hi.
A thumaan a cilin om ta.
A tawntung in a kip ding hi.

zo.1:
Hong gum Topa hong it lamdang
Lungdam sin dam la ka sa.
Ki ciamna hong pel sak nuam hi.
Singlamteh tung si zo ta.
zo.2:
Vantung inn nuampi luahna ding
A lamdang thupha gen hi.
Hong hehpih hong it luat man in
Ka mawh hong phel sak zo hi.
zo.3:
Hong gum Topa A minthang hi.
Nisim la sa in phat ning.
Sih ciang mawh tanna mei kuang sung
Hong tung sak nuam lo ding hi.
zo.4:
Hong gum Topa hong itna pha
La pha ka sak ding ngai hi.
Sihna, hin' tawntungna lamah
Amah tawh ka om ding hi.
zo.chorus:
Topa phat na sak ding la pha
A si pha tawh hong sawp hi
Singlamteh tung sihna thuak a
Ka mawh hong phel sak zo hi.

zo.1:
Siangtho, siangtho, siangtho!
A lian pen Topa Pasian!
Zingsang tungin phatna la kong sak to ding uh hi.
Siangtho, siangtho, siangtho!
Hehpih thei a vaang lian!
Thum ki gawmna siangtho thupha Pasian!
zo.2:
Siangtho, siangtho, siangtho!
Na mi siang kheempeuh in,
Kham lu khute suah khia in
Nangmah hong bia uh hi.
Vantung mihingte in,
Nangma maiah kunin
Tawntung Pasian Nang mah hong bia uh hi.
zo.3:
Siangtho, siangtho, siangtho!
Khuamial hong liah hang in,
Mawhna mitin Na vaanglian hong mu thei lo hangin.
Nangmah bek Na siangtho,
Kuamah'n hong ban zo lo,
Na vaang liatna,
It na le sian'thona.
zo.4:
Siangtho, siangtho, siangtho!
A lian pen To Pasian!
Leitung, tuitung, vantungah Na min Kiphat ding hi.
Siangtho, siangtho, siangtho!
Hehpih thei a vaanglian!
Thum kigawmna siangtho thupha Pasian!

zo.1:
Ngai in, ka kha aw, vantung mi la sakna
Leitung lungdam tuipi tung zong thang hi.
La pha sakna a aw zak no huai bel hi.
Hing ki kheel mawh kiphelna thu gen hi.
zo.2:
La aw zak ciang mailam nawt in i pai hi.
Lungkham a gim te aw hong pai un ci.
Khuamial sung ah
Topa Zeisu ki ko hi.
Vantung inn lam hilhna thupha aw hi.
zo.3:
Gam lapi ah ni tak siklong ging bang in
Leitung, tuitung ah Zeisu aw ging hi.
Tui then tham lo a van lel mi tampi in
Tuu cing Topa aw Na kiang kong pai hi.
zo.4:
Tu laitak i lungkham a sawt hangin-ah
Khuamial kheng leeng nuam na'ng khuavaak ding hi
A gimte zuihna lam a bei ciangin-ah
Kha siangtho maang ding kham gam tung ding hi.
zo.chorus:
Thu ciamna cing kham vantung mihingte in
A aw zak nop huai in la sa uh hi.
Nitak kap-a zing-sang ciang lungdam sak hi
Sawtvei khuamial it-na khuavaak sak in.

zo.1:
Leitung mihing te aw en un
Dahna thuak Zeisu a hi
A gal kheempeuhte zo gawp zo,
Mi kheempeuh in bia uh hi.
zo.2:
Vantung a mihing kheempeuh in
Topa Zeisu min phat hi
Thukhen tokhom tung tusak a
Vantung mite'n phatsak hi.
zo.3:
Mi gilote'n ling tawh kigan
Lukhu Zeisu khusak hi.
Mi siangtho leh vantung mite'n
Tu'n Zeisu a min phat hi.
zo.4:
A min phat in a kiko un
Gal zo pawi khaamna ngai un.
Topa Zeisu in maan ngah hi.
Lung dam huai bel hi, en un.
zo.chorus:
Kumpi lukhu, kumpi lukhu
Topa Zeisu khusak un,
Kumpi lukhu, kumpi lukhu
Topa Zeisu khusak un.

zo.1:
Pa aw, ka kikhen uh ciang;
Ko lungsim Nag deih bang hi ta hen.
Eite khat leh khat I kikhen ciangin
Topa Pasian in, I omna ciah-ah
Hong keem tawntung ta hen. Amen

title.english: Praise to the Lord, The Almighty

zo.1:
Topa phat un, na kheempeuh a piangsak Kumpipa hi.
Aw ka kha aw, Amah phat in damna gupna hong pia.
Tua thu zate'n a biak inn sung zuan dingin,
Amah va bia khawm ciat ve ni.
zo.2:
Topa phat un, na kheempeuh a vekpi Ama uk hi.
A kha nuaiah tawldam, lungmuan' nopsakna a hong pia.
Na deih nai hiam, A hoihna na muh ciangin,
Ama hong piak kheempeuh thei ni.
zo.3:
Topa phat un, na sepna bawl na kheempeuh hong huh hi.
A maan takin hehpihna leh nopna tawh hong khuh dia.
Lung ngai ngai in, A mah tha hatna thei in.
Amah tawh va kipawl thei ni.

title.zo: Topa Thupha Sang Nuam I Kikhawm Hi
title.english: We Gather Together to Ask The Lord's Blessing

zo.1:
Topa thupha saang nuam ngen in I kikhawm hi;
Ama deihna theih na ding manlang hong puak;
Dawi netcip thuak nate tu'n bei in lung nuam ta,
Amin phatna la sa, A mi mang-ngilh lo hi.
zo.2:
Eite lam hong lak ding, Pasian i kiang hong om,
A van tung gam puah in a siangtho sak hi.
Tua a hih manin, a kipat pan gal i zo
Ko lam aa hong pang Topa, Na min thang ta hen.
zo.3:
Na min kong phat uh hi. Gal zo makai pi pa,
Kote hong dal hong keem ding kong ngen uh hi.
Ze-et na tawh mite hong ki pelh sak in
Na min kiphat den hen! Topa hong gum in.

title.zo: Pasian Naseemte Aw, Na Topa'n Gen Khia Zo
title.english: Ye Servants of God, Your Master Proclaim

zo.1:
Pa na seemte aw, gamlapi zeel un,
Topa'n thang sak hi, lamdang Ama min
Na kheempeuh a zo min Zeisu ahi hi.
Ama gam in zai a na kheempeuh uk hi.
zo.2:
Thahat Pasian in gum ding van pan uk,
Amah'n hong zuan hi, A kiang i om hi.
Mihon tampi'n zong zawhna la sa uh hi.
Ei hong gum Kumpipa Zeisu hi, ci hi.
zo.3:
Kumpi tokhom tung To gumpa Pasian,
Vekpi in phat hi, A Tapa phat hi.
Vantung mite'n zong Zeisu a phat uh hi.
Tuuno mai bok in, Amah a bia uh hi.
zo.4:
Ei zong phat tek ni, A vaang liatna thu,
A min than'na thu, A pilna, hatna,
Phatna leh thupha tawh i phat tek ding hi.
Van pan vantung mi'n tawntung itna phat hi.

zo.1:
Zing ni suak sensan ta.
Ka lungsim khanglo ta
Zeisu Khazih phathuai!
Na seem ding, thu ngen ding.
Zeisu kiang va zuan ning.
Zeisu khazih phat huai!
zo.2:
Lung sung dahna om hiam,
Hihah ka dahna kiam,
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!
Leitung nuamna bei le,<>br/>Hehnepna om veve
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!
zo.3:
Vantung lungdamna ah
La a ngaih pen hih mah,
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!
Khuamial vaangte'n kihta
A zak uh ciang hih la
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!
zo.4:
Leitung ka hin' lai teng
Sa ning ka sih mateng;
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!
Sih ciang vantung tung leng
Ka la hih mah hi leng;
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!

title.zo: Zeisu! Na Min Ngaih Ka It Hi
title.english: Jesus! I Love thy Charming Name

zo.1:
Zeisu! Na min ngaih ka it hi,
Bil in tua la ka za;
Nakpi piin ging khia sak in,
Vantung leitung thawn in.
zo.2:
Ka kha aading Nang Na manpha,
Ka lampi leh ka muan
Nangma maiah suang mangphate,
Milim no zep bang hi.
zo.3:
Ka deih teng leh ka ut kheempeuh,
Nang sungah kimtak om;
Kei mit in kiman lo sa keng,
Lawm tak lo bang sa keng.
zo.4:
Na hehpihna ka lung sung teeng,
A namtuina hong bua;
Liamma kheempeuh a damsak thei,
Itna tawh hong keem hi.

zo.1:
Kong phat uh hi, Topa, tuzan,
Na thupha khuavaak hong pia in;
Hong keem in, aw, kei hong keem in,
Na vaanglian Kumpi kha nuaiah.
zo.2:
Zeisu min in hong maisak in,
Tu ni dong ka mawhna sate;
Hih leitungah Nang leh kei bek,
Nuam takin hong ihmu sak in.
zo.3:
Nuntakna lamkei hong hilh in,
Tua hi kei leh kei ka si ding.
Sihna ding thu kei hong hilh in,
Thu khen ni ciang thawh kikna thu.
zo.4:
Ka kha Nag kiang hong la in la,
Nuam tak kei hong ihmu sak in;
Tua in kei hong thahat sak in,
Ka thawh kik ciang Topa phat ning.

title.zo: Hong Khihna In A Pha Hi
title.english: Blest Be The Tie That Binds

zo.1:
Ei lung hong khih nading
Zeisu itna pha hi.
Lung kituakna in vantung khua
Kituak na bang om hi.
zo.2:
Ei Pa tokhom maiah
Nakpi thu i ngen hi.
Ei lawp na, upna, deihna teng
A ki bangin om hi.
zo.3:
Ei te'n dahna thuak khawm
Van puakna ki pua hi.
Khatvei vei i lawmte aading
Khitui a luang thei hi.
zo.4:
Eite kikhen ciangin
Lungsim dahna piang hi.
Hih bang i lungsim tawh om khawm
Nung ciang kimu ding hi.

title.english: Lord, Dismiss Us With Thy Blessing

zo.1:
Topa aw, Nangma thupha tawh
Dim in hong kikhen sak in
Nangma itna bang neihna tawh
Hehpihna hong paksak in.
Tha hong guan aw, tha hong guan aw
Hih gam mang sung zin lai in.
zo.2:
Nangma lungdam thu hanginah
Nang kong phat uh Topa aw,
Ko lung sung leh gamtatna ah
Na hotna gah lang leh maw.
Nang thumaanah, Nang thumaanah
Hong kip tawntung le ung maw.
zo.3:
Leitung pan in Nong sap peuh ciang,
Sihna kihta het loin
Vantung mite'n hong lenpih ciang,
Hong mang ning lungdam takin
Tawntung Na kiang, tawntung Na kiang,
Nangmah tawh hong maang sak in./p>

title.zo: Topa Aw, It Huai Na Min Phat Na'ng La!
title.english: Saviour, Again To Thy Dear Name

zo.1:
Topa aw, it huai Na min phat na'ng la
Lungsim kikhat in kong sa lai uh a,
Ko kikhen ma in kong phat khawm uh hi,
Nangma thupha kun in kong ngak uh hi.
zo.2:
Nangma thupha tawh hong ciah sak in la
Na min tawh tu ni hong khin sak in la,
Ka kam ka muk uh leh komau lungsim
Khial lo nadingin Nangmah'n hong cing kim.
zo.3:
Tuzan khuavaak lung nopna hong guan in
Khuamial, ko aading khuavaak suaksak in,
Nang aading sun le zan danglo manin
Na tate launa pan hong keem ta in.
zo.4:
Leitung nun'tak lai lungnop hong pia in.
Dah hong neem in, hong kipsak tawntung in;
Ko gal dona Nong tawlngak sak tak ciang,
Hong sam in tawntung nopna Nangma kiang.

title.zo: Topa A Inn Siangtho Sung Om Hi
title.english: The Lord Is In His Holy Temple

zo.1:
Topa A inn siangtho sung om hi, Topa
A inn siangtho sung om hi,
Dai dide in om ta un,
Dai dide in om ta un,
Amai ah, Dai dide'n om ta un,
Amai ah. Amen

title.zo: Nangmah Tawh Pasian Om Khawm Ta Hen

zo.1:
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen;
A hong pi, a hong len dingin,
A tuu tawh hong keem bit dingin,
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen.
zo.2:
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen;
A kha nuai hong liah hong dal in,
Nisim 'Manna' hong vaak dingin,
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen.
zo.3:
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen;
Launa'n hong lungim sak ciang in,
Angsung hong pom bik-bek dingin
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen.
zo.4:
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen;>
Itna nuai-ah hong cing dingin,
Sihna tuihual satpaai dingin
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen.
zo.chorus:
I kimuh kik mateng,
Zeisu kiang kimuh mateng,
I kimuh kikma teng,
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen.

zo.1:
Kei tawh Om khawm in, ni a tum zo a
Khua mial sem sem in kei kiangah om ta.
Hong gum ding a dang om lo lai takin
Hong gum Topa aw kei kiangah om in.
zo.2:
Leitung nuntakna mengmeng'n bei thei,
Leitung-ah nuam na om tawntung thei kei
Leitung-ah siatna ngentang ka mu ta,
Kei tawh om khawm in sia thei kei Topa.
zo.3:
Kei tawh om khawm, Kei ma tha a pha kei,
Nangmah bek in zo etna na zo thei.
Nangmah bangin kua'n hong paipih thei maw!
Lungdam loh laitak kei tawh om khawm aw.
zo.4:
Thupah na hong piak leh kei ka lau lo,
Dahna khitui'n zong hong sia sak zo lo.
Sihna leh han in hong zo thei lopi.
Kei tawh na om khawm leh ka zo thei hi.
zo.5:
Keima ka mit si ka sih lai takin
Na singlamteh ka mai-ah hong lak in.
Vantung khuavaak leitung khuamial bei a
Sih laitak kei tawh om khawm in Topa.

title.zo: A Vaanglian Pa Aw, Ko Thum Na Hong Ngai In

zo.1:
A vaanglian Pa aw, kong thum hong ngai in,
Na ma, hong ngak ko thupha hong pia'n.
Amen.

title.zo: Tung Sun Ni A Tum Ta A
title.english: Day Is Dying In The West

zo.1:
Tung sun ni a tum ta-a
Tawl ngakna hun hong tung ta;
Zan aksi hong suak lai-a
Thangvan paak bang palh lai-a
Pasian bia ni.
zo.2:
Nuntakna a uk Topa,
Van nuai teng Nang ma omna
Nangma mai hong zong kote,
Na ang sungah hong khawm vo,
Kinai tak-in.
zo.3:
Khua hong mial sem-sem hangin,
A taang aksite khengin
Ko lungsim hong kha to tan
Nangma mai mu nuam in-ah,
Vannuai it-pa.
zo.4:
Aksite le zan le sun
Mu ngei nawn lo ding a hun
Hong tun' ciang, vantung Topa'n
Tawntung zing khua vaak sak ta'n,
Kote' mai-ah
zo.chorus:
Siangtho, siangtho, siangtho, Topa Pasian
Leitung, vantungah Na vaang,
Nangmah phatna hong kilang
Saang bel Pasian!

title.english: God that Modest Earth and Heaven

zo.1:
Leitung, vantung, khuamial, khuavaak, Piang sak Pasian,
Sun na sep hun leh zan tawlngak Hong pia Pasian,
Na vantung mi hong cing sak in
Ihmut nuam tawh ohng hehpih in,
Ngaihsut, lamet siangtho hong guan in,
Tuzan khuavaak.
zo.2:
Nun' tak lam mai nawt nading zing Khuavaak cianga
Ko hong mang keei-kaai zo nading Nangma deihna.
Siatna' vang panin hong dal in.
Lam kawcikah hong paipih in,
Sun niloh hong mu khial sak kei-in
Nang ma maipha.

title.zo: Tu In Sun' Ni Tum Ta

zo.1:
Tu in sun ni lum ta,
Zan hong nai ta hi;
Nitak khuamui mialna
Damdam hong tung hi.
zo.2:
Zeisu aw a gimte,
Tawldam hong pia in
Na thupha tawh kote,
Hong ihmu sak in.
zo.3:
Ko Nangma ta-note,
Nang hong mu sak in.
Tuipi tung khualzinte,
Nangmah'n Na keem in.
zo.4:
Tuzan-khuavaak inah,
Na vantung mite'n,
Ko tung kha zak-inah
Ko hong cing uh hen.

zo.1:
Topa aw, ko ihmut ma in
Nitak thupha hong pia in.
Mawhna le kisapna ko nei,
Nong hon thei, Nong damsak thei.
zo.2:
Siatna in hong kiim vel hangin
Thaltang tawh hong kap hangin
Na vantung mite'n hong cing a,
Nong nai ciang lau nawn lo ta.
zo.3:
Zan khua a mial phat bangin
Nang hong liah lo khuamial in.
Na mihingte' omna peuhah
Nang, gim ngei lo a cing-Pa
zo.4:
Tuzan ciangin ko lupna tung
Theih kholh loh ka si zongun;
A vul ngeilo paak palh bangin
Vantungah zing khanglo ding.

zo.1:
Hong gum Topa ni taang bang hi
Ama kiang khuamial ngei lo hi.
Topa aw, Na mai kong muh na'ng
Meiilum kaite na theng sak in.
zo.2:
Topa ka lung kham ciangin-ah
Mitgui in a kham luat lai-ah
Topa aw, Nangma ang sungah
Ka tawl ka hong damsak nuam ta.
zo.3:
Topa aw, Nang na om laiah
Sih ding ka kih ta keimah in
Keimah tawh a om khawm dingin
Nisim in Topa hong pai in.
zo.4:
Tu lai-a Na thua hong sel-a
Thupha bel hong nialte inah
Nung ciangin a khial loh na'ngin
Lam a khialte na hehpih in.
zo.5:
Nitak-a a thum a taute
Cidam lo a a zawngkhalte
Na thupha kong na hon' in la
A lung na dam sak in, Topa

title.english: Safely Now The Light Of Day

zo.1:
Tu-in sun-ni tum diai-diai,
Ka mit khua hong mui hiaihiai
Lungsim, pumpi tawlnga in
Topa, hong om khawm nuam ing.
zo.2:
Ka sung ka pua Na mu khin;
Hong maisak in a vekpi'n
Kilanga ka khialhna le
Simthama ka mawhnate.
zo.3:
Kei aading a sawt loin
Sun khuavaak hong bei ciangin,
Mawhna dahna pengin-ah
Hong la in Nangma kiangah
zo.4:
Nang Na neih loh hang mawhna,
Na thei ka gitnat lohna;
Tua hi-a To Zeisu aw
Hehpihna tawh hong en aw

title.zo: Topa, Ni Nong Piak Ni, Bei Khin Ta
title.english: The Day Thou Gavest, Lord, Is Ended

zo.1:
Topa ni Nong piak ni bei khin ta,
Na thu pick bang in khua hong mial;
Zing sim in phatna la hong sak ung,
Tawlnga lo-in Nang hong phat nung.
zo.2:
Hih leitung khuavaak hong taan'lai in,
Na Pawlpite ihmu ngei lo;
Gam kheempeuhah Nang bek hong ki-en,
Sun le zan tawlnga ngei kei nung.
zo.3:
Leitung tui-tung tui-kulh mun teng-ah,
A hun sial-sial in khua hong vaak,
Tawlnga ngei lo-in thu hong ngen ung,
Na min phat-na bei ngei lo ding.
zo.4:
Hih leitung kumpi gamte bangin
Na ukna gam bei ngei kei hen.
Na bawlsa leitung na kheempeuh in!
Na ukna gam bei ngei lo ding.

title.zo: Ka Kha Aw, Topa Phat in

zo.1:
Minthang Kumpi phat un, A mah bek Pasian;
Phat un, ei hong lak zo hi, na lam-dang lian;
Khualzin mi tonpih den ding, hong ciam phat un,
Meikhuam leh sun aa meiipi hangin phat un.
zo.2:
Mi Kheempeuh tat khiatna hong pia khong phat un;
A siang sak thei tui-khuk hong piak man phat un;
Mi-gi hong it, hong kep-na hang in phat un,
I thu nget-nate hong dawn' manin phat un.
zo.3:
Hong it man hong ze-etna hang in phat un,
Ei-te hong kip sak in, hong lak hi, van mun;
Gal zo muan'na mit lo lawpna hang phat un,
It teng ki-tuah khawn na'ng mun hangin phat um.
zo.chorus:
Phat un, a taang van min'n,
Kham gawsem lom in
A mi kheempeuh in phat A mai en sa in,
A gam lianpi sungah, Kumtawn kha tawn in;
A bawlsate'n phat ding, Ka kah aw phat in.
A bawlsate'n phat ding, Ka kha aw phat in.

title.zo: Na Kheempeuh A Uk Topa'n Kumpi

zo.1:
Na kheempeuh Topa, Kumpi suak,
Na min thanna Ni, aksi'n taang,
Leitung bup-pi hin'na laizang,
Itna lungsim neite kiang nai
zo.2:
Nun-tak na Ni, eite aa ding,
I lam piah hong taang suk hi;
Lam et na aksi na vot sak;
Zan sawt vil-a om mi nuam sak.
zo.3:
Zan khuamial in Na nuih mai liah,
Sun ni taang Nong hehpih na hi,
Sa khi tuihup hehpih na lim;
Mawhna meii bang a then sak ta.
zo.4:
Suah takna thumaan hong pia in,
Nang aading lungsim tawhkuan' in
A nungta Na biak inn suah dong,
Siangtho khuavaak, vantung khuavaak. Amen

title.zo: Lungdam In Kong Bia Uh Hi

zo.1:
Min than'na leh itna Topa,
Lungdam in kong bia uh hi;
Lungsim paak bang palh Na mai-ah,
Na vaang taang sung hong malh hi.
Mawhna dahna meii thensak in,
Hawl khia in lung muan' lahna,
Sun ni taang ko sung hong dim in,
Tul lo nuamna hong guan' Pa.
zo.2:
Lei leh van in na vaang lang sak,
Hong pah-tawi na bawlsa te'n
Aksi leh van mite'n hong sak,
Tat sat lo-in hong phat den,
Lo leh tu-lak mual leh kuamte'n
Lo dumna kham leh tuipi,
Cik tui phul leh vasa hamte'n
Nang sung nuam din' hong zawn' hi
zo.3:
Mawh maisak Pa, Thupha pia Pa,
Cing tawn-tung thu-pua Na hi;
Tuinak bang nun' na sung nuamna,
Tawl ngakna nuam pen Na hi.
Itna nei peuh Nang aa hi khin.
Ko te'n Pa leh Hon-pa aw,
Ko ki it tek na'ng hong hilh in,
Na nuam-na sung dom to aw.

zo.1:
Zeisun'n i thumna hong za;
A migi tuucing Pa'n
Na hehpihna tawh ko-te
Lungsim bit tak hong keem in. Amen
zo.2:
Nang sung ka tha hat nangun
Natna kheempeuh nuam sak in;
Na deih bang hong hi sak in
Lungdam hiah kimuh kik nang. Amen

title.english: A Mighty Fortress Is Our God

zo.1:
I Pasian muan'huai kulh pi hi,
A sia nei lo kidalna;
Mawhna tui bang a let mite,
Puan bang sawp siang Huhpa hi;
Tanglai pu le pa gal,
Ei tung gal bang hong zong;
A siamna vaang a lian,
Git-loh muh dahna dim;
Leitung leh a gam teh lo.
zo.2:
Eite'n ci tha bek i suang hiam?
Ei tha bek in zo lo ding;
Ei lam a pang mi maan om lo,
Pasian teel khiat mi pa in,
Kua pen a hi ding hiam?
Zeisu Kha zih a hi.
A min Topa Pasian
Tanglai, tulai ki-bang,
Gal a zo tawntung ding hi.
zo.3:
Dawi tawh kidim hih leitung in,
Ei te hong bawlsia ding in,
Pasian deih kei i lam kei ding,
Amah'n hong zawhpih ding hi.
Khua mialna kumpipa
Aa-ding i liing kei hi.
Amah i do zo ding,
En un, sia dek ta hi;
kammal khat tawh puk ding hi.
zo.4:
Leitung vaang liatnate tungah,
Lung damna piak kul lo hi
Kha Siangtho hehpihna ei aa,
Ei lam Amah hong pang khawm,
Leitung nuntakna leh
Nate sia khin ding a;
Pumpi a that ding hi;
Pasian thumaan kip in,
A gam kip tawntung ding hi.

title.zo: A Hing Tawntung Kha Siangtho Piang Sak Den Hi

zo.1:
A hing tawntung Kha Siangtho in piang sak hi,
Hih leitunga nuntakna nei kheempeuh,
Nuntakna sih ni tawlnga nei lo-in pai,
Na min than'na zingsol la in ki-sa,
Hih leitung mite in siatna ngak in om,
Mite lungsim siatna bek tawh dim hi.
zo.2:
Aw, Topa Nang sung sian'tho-na a dim hi,
Nang sungah nun takna cik-tui luang hi,
Na Kha Siangtho in man-lang takin khauh sak,
Mawhna, sihna te tungah gual zo hi
Ko kha dim sak in la, hong siangtho sak in,
Ka gal uh ka zawh na ding hong huh in!
zo.3:
Lungnop na ding pan, hak satna sungah mang,
Nat theihna, sih theihna khuamial sungah,
Nong itna khuavaak hong taang sak tawntung in,
Lungkham gimna a thuak mi hong keem in,
Lungsim kha hang te Nang deih bang hi hen,
Tho-a a dang tawh kibat kik na ding!
zo.4:
Aw, Nang sung hek-ah ko hoihna ding kimuang,
Tanglai pek-a Na mite hong omna,
Zing daii bangin nisial a thak a suak,
Kote lam-et bang lungsim tha hong guan' in,
Tha khauhna ngah in lam ka pai nangun! Amen.

zo.1:
Topa Pasian Nangma khut a na bawlsa
Leitung khempeuh ka ngaihsut cianginah,
Aksite mu in, van gingte ka za hi,
Leitung kheempeuh-ah Na vaang kilang hi.
zo.2:
Sing lakah zong ka vak kawi kawi ciangin-ah,
Singkung tungah vasa ham ngaih ka za,
Mual sang dawn pan khuam thuk sung ka et suk ciang
Lui ging za in huih dam hong nung hiauhiau
zo.3:
Pasian in-ah A Tapa haza lo-in,
Hong puak ka ngaih sut ciang um kei phial ing,
Singlamteh tung kei van lungdam tak pua in,
Si san luangin, ka mawhna hong paih sak.
zo.4:
Kikona tawh, Khazih hong pai kik ciangin,
Hong ciahpih ding, Bangzah ka nuam ding hiam?
Tua ciang kiniam khiatna tawh ka bia ding-a,
'Ka Pasian lian hi,' ci'n ka kiko ding.
zo.chorus:
Tua a-hih ciang, la kong sa hong hon-pa
Bangzah Na lian,
Bangzah Na lian,
Tua ahih ciang, kong phat hi, Topa aw,
Nang Na lian hi,
Nang Na lian hi.

title.zo: 'Na Thumaanna Lian Hi,' Ka Pa Pasian Aw

zo.1:
'Na thumaan-na lian hi,' ka Pa Pasian aw;
Kihei ki kheelna liim Na nei kei hi.
Nangma hehpihna ki kheel in bei ngei lo,
Tanglai bangmah Na hi tawntung ding hi.
zo.2:
Ni, kha lo aksite, ngeina bang ciat in,
Khuakhal le tuk hunte, phal bi, ni pi
Ngeina bang zui a hun hun-a piangte in
Na thumaan, hehpih, itna hong lak hi
zo.3:
Mawhna mai sak na lo a kip lung nopna,
Nong om pih lung damna lam Nong hilh na,
A ni sim Nong kepna mailam lung, muan'na,
A pha tampite zong, Nangma thupha.
zo.chorus:
Na thumaan-na lina hi,
Na thu maan-na lian hi.
Zingsang simin hehpihna thak ka mu;
Ka sapna teng Na khut in hong guan' tawn-tung
'Na thu maanna lian hi,' Topa kei tung.

zo.1:
A hong kum suk Topa
Na min phatna ding la
Ko hong pia in.
Vaang lian minthang Topa
Leitung kheempeuh zo a
Hong pai hong uk in la
Beisa ni tawh.
zo.2:
Biakna nuamna hong pia
Kote'n thu hong ngetna
Na hong ngai in.
Lam khial nei mite in
Thu muh kik na dingin
Lam hilh ding hong pai in
Kha Siangtho aw.
zo.3:
Thu hilh Kha Siangtho aw
Hilh ding hong pai in la
Tu'n hong pai aw.
Siamna a om kheempeuh
Kha Siangtho om kheempeuh
Ko tungah hong pia'n la
Hong uk ta aw.
zo.4:
Nam thum pawl khat Pasian
Topa nangmah a lian.
Na min thang hen.
Vantung gam sung nangmah
Na vaanglian mi dingin
Nangmah a tawntung-in
Ka it ding hi.
